de: At Songes et Cacao, everything that can be done by hand is done by hand! We transform raw cocoa beans into chocolate bars of various flavours. The chocolate takes shape in our workshop in Lamastre, in the heart of the Ardèche. The must-have: the chestnut bar.
ru: At Songes et Cacao, everything that can be done by hand is done by hand! We transform raw cocoa beans into chocolate bars of various flavours. The chocolate takes shape in our workshop in Lamastre, in the heart of the Ardèche. The must-have: the chestnut bar.
en: At Songes et Cacao, everything that can be done by hand is done by hand! We transform raw cocoa beans into chocolate bars of various flavours. The chocolate takes shape in our workshop in Lamastre, in the heart of the Ardèche. The must-have: the chestnut bar.
it: At Songes et Cacao, everything that can be done by hand is done by hand! We transform raw cocoa beans into chocolate bars of various flavours. The chocolate takes shape in our workshop in Lamastre, in the heart of the Ardèche. The must-have: the chestnut bar.
fr:
Du chocolat "cru" et bean-to-bar fabriqué à la main au cœur de l'Ardèche. Re-découvrez le vrai goût du chocolat, des saveurs subtiles et une richesse aromatique loin des goûts standardisés.
 L'incontournable : la tablette à la châtaigne !
nl: Bij Songes et Cacao wordt alles wat met de hand gedaan kan worden ook met de hand gedaan! Wij verwerken rauwe cacaobonen tot chocoladerepen met verschillende smaken. De chocolade krijgt vorm in ons atelier in Lamastre, in het hart van de Ardèche. De must-have: de kastanjebar.
